alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Northwest Carter; Southeast Carter; Sullivan; Unicoi; Washington (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 4:13PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of central Sullivan, southeastern Washington, northeastern Unicoi, Johnson, Carter and southern Washington Counties and the City of Bristol through 600 PM EDT... At 511 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers and a few thunderstorms along a line extending from Walnut Hill to near Elizabethton to near Erwin. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Elizabethton, Abingdon, Erwin, Mountain City, Central, Pine Crest and Walnut Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Johnson; Northwest Carter; Southeast Carter; Sullivan; Unicoi; Washington
